Package terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.mappers

Interface Summary
ObjectPickTarget This interface serves as a target for scene object-pick events.
 

Class Summary
DirectInputDragPlugin An input drag mapper plugin that directly maps input drag value dimensions to target actuation value dimensions.
InputDragMapper A coordinate mapper that translates a 2D input drag into an actuation output as defined by an input drag mapper personality plugin.
InputDragMapperPlugin An abstract base class for input drag mapper personality plugins.
Mapper Provides mapper related constants and utilities, such as for picking and spatial transformation.
ObjectPickMapper Maps display move and drag event inputs into object pick events.
ObjectPickSplitter Splits (multicasts) the source event to multiple event targets.
OverEnableMapper Maps object pick event inputs into enable event outputs that indicate to the event target when the pick cursor is over its corresponding pick target.
PickEngine Encapsulates the logic for picking a target node in the scene.
